pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Para-DX's $(l:ex_aid/devices/paradoxbelt)Para-DX Buckle$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Para-DX's $(l:ex_aid/riders/para_dx#puzzle)Puzzle Gamer Level 50$(/l)
